sentences.en: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.cn: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

sentences.en: George is a public relations officer for The John Bennett Trust.
sentences.cn: 乔治是约翰·本尼特信托公司的一名公关主管。

sentences.en: He got permission from his commanding officer to join me.
sentences.cn: 他得到指挥官的许可来与我会合。

sentences.en: He hurried to the Mess to find the control officer.
sentences.cn: 他匆忙赶到餐厅去找指挥官。

sentences.en: He served during peace-time as an intelligence officer in the Navy.
sentences.cn: 他在和平时期担任海军情报官员。

sentences.en: He was described by his seniors as a model officer.
sentences.cn: 上司们形容他是个模范官员。

sentences.en: He was returned to prison in 1977 for impersonating a police officer.
sentences.cn: 他1977年因冒充警官而再次入狱。

sentences.en: One of the apprentices made an insulting remark to a passing officer.
sentences.cn: 其中一名学徒对着一名路过的警官说了一句侮辱他的话。

sentences.en: Sergeant Cobbins was an experienced officer and didn't miss much.
sentences.cn: 科宾斯巡佐是一位经验丰富的警官，很少有东西从他眼皮底下溜走。

sentences.en: Sir, could you please come to the commanding officer's office?
sentences.cn: 长官，请您到指挥官的办公室来一下好吗？

sentences.en: The most junior executive officer outranked the senior engineer officer aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 在舰船上，级别最低的副舰长也位列级别最高的轮机官之上。

sentences.en: The Night Duty Officer was ready to clock off.
sentences.cn: 值夜班的警员准备打卡下班。
那个官员面无表情地听着。

sentences.en: The officer replied in halting German.
sentences.cn: 这位官员用结结巴巴的德语作答。

sentences.en: The officer stamped his boot. "Don't be insolent with me, mademoiselle."
sentences.cn: 军官跺跺靴子：“小姐，别对我无礼。”

trans.tran_cn: 军官，警官，高级职员，公务员，船长
trans.tran_en: someone who is in a position of authority in the army, navy etc
